page.title: 03Newton Poppleford School
page.content: My name is Samantha and I am a pupil at Newton Poppleford County Primary School.Our school was built in 1876 and then it was called Harpford School.There are three teachers (Mr.Bolsover,Miss Baker and Mrs.Griffith) and the Headmaster whose name is Mr.S.Kerrigan. The school has 87 children(47 boys and 40 girls)There are three classes as the Headmaster doesn't have one.The children at our school are aged from 5 to 11 and when we finish most of us go to Sidmouth College. The school has quite a few sports facilities a playing field,football pitch,a swimming pool and a hall with P.E equipment.
